name: 家有大貓 Nekojishi
description: Nekojishi is a visual novel about feline beast-men, Taiwanese folklore, and the pressures and consequences that come with navigating the world of gods and spirits.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Must support python
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Storage: 1 GB available space
